code: import React from'react';import{Row,Col,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{useCart}from'./Cartcontext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CartPage(){const{cartItems,removeFromCart,updateQuantity}=useCart();const handleIncreaseQuantity=id=>{const item=cartItems.find(item=>item.id===id);if(item){updateQuantity(id,item.quantity+1);}};const handleDecreaseQuantity=id=>{const item=cartItems.find(item=>item.id===id);if(item&&item.quantity>1){updateQuantity(id,item.quantity-1);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{sm:12,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Cart"}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No items in cart."}):cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center py-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.brand,style:{width:"100px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.brand}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.Price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>handleDecreaseQuantity(item.id),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:()=>handleIncreaseQuantity(item.id),children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"danger",onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item.id),children:"Remove"})]})]},item.id))]})})});}export default CartPage;
